website_summaries.verdict: A good, durable basic rope with a comfortable handle and decent length.
pros: Handle made from aluminum to float
16-strand rope is treated to prevent sun damage
Soft padded cover on the handle offers decent grip
Easy to see in the water
A good value for the money
cons: The quality on this isn't as thick or sturdy as some others available

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: No competitive water skiing here, but works! Rope feels a bit thin but hasn't broke. Does tangle quite a bit when storing.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Erdely

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot of spring in it. So people ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of spring in it. So people in the back of the boat need to be on the lookout for the handle coming back at them.
customer_reviews.author: ShaunR

customer_reviews.title: Using for home physical therapy and turned out to be a great aid.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for bedridden relative to be used during physical therapy! Has really helped develop upper body strength. Not it's intended use but doing the job for a small price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: for the price its great, a little thin but pulls me up etc no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The kids choose this one over our other rope that cost 3 times as much (and i like it better too!). Stands up to all the punishment we can give it, no wear or deterioration. Will buy it again if we ever need another!
customer_reviews.author: Roylance Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not thick
customer_reviews.text: Made thin but for the money guess get what u pay for
customer_reviews.author: dana creel

customer_reviews.title: Great item for skiing
customer_reviews.text: Great item for skiing , knee boarding , tubing , easy to locate in the water , and floats well.
customer_reviews.author: joann maybury

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not using it as a ski rope but rather as a tow rope behind my bike (to pull my friends around on skateboards) I was really happy that the handle and about 3ft of rope could disconnect from the main rope so I didn't have to cut anything. Besides that if you're going to use it for its actual purpose I know that this handle will sink but a great cheap and simple handle.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Frayfailed on first time out
customer_reviews.text: First time using, noticed one of the strands had failed, and that made the rope that much weaker. Returned before it broke completely
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory, but probably wont last long
customer_reviews.text: Very thin rope. Don't think it will last long, but I guess ya get what ya pay for
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Not the strongest. Thin but worked well enough for tube
customer_reviews.author: K. garrett

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and was just what we needed to pull the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great tow rope for the price. Negative a star for it only being once piece, but that's my bad for not reading the description closer..
customer_reviews.author: Greg L.

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: It's fine - works as it should. This is 2nd one - the first one I got tangled in prop. I had to move the boat as it was coming close to the rocky shore and the line snaps (of course).
customer_reviews.author: Milan Jirak

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This product is used for pulling myself up off a very narrow work bench
customer_reviews.author: mande236

customer_reviews.title: Great rope, great price
customer_reviews.text: Rope works great and handle floats which is a huge plus. Fantastic deal compared to shopping local in store.
customer_reviews.author: pitbullguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, price was right. Haven't tried it yet but I'm sure it'll work great.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: It worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Pulled my son on his knee board this week. It worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Francine Rachal

customer_reviews.title: good price frays quickly
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find. after using it a handful of times it is already starting to fray in a couple spots and it says not to use if damaged or fraying
customer_reviews.author: Chad V.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with this ski rope. Worked as described and we would purchase again if we need to. :)
customer_reviews.author: Midds

customer_reviews.title: Worked just fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought two so we could tow two kids knee boarding at the same time and were just fine for that
customer_reviews.author: R. Izzo

customer_reviews.title: Great ski rope for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great rope for the money. Handle does float and is very comfortable in your hand. Definitely would buy again. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Skizix272

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough.
customer_reviews.text: The rope worked, but very poor quality. Sent it back. Just not good enough for my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Allboutme

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive ski line.
customer_reviews.text: Quality Ski line. Handle is comfortable, but not huge and squishy. Great for people that dont have monster hands.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Love that is floats!!
customer_reviews.text: The soft handle makes skiing and knee boarding easier on your hands. The fact that it floats makes it easier to get skis on and knee board ready not having to worry about it sinking and having to swim back to the boat to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Penn

product_meta.title: AIRHEAD Ski Rope, Rubber Handle, 1 Section
product_meta.description: AIRHEAD Promotional Water Ski Rope - This 1 section ski rope has an aluminum floating handle and molded end caps for safety and comfort. The 16-strand 75 foot long rope is UV-treated and pre-stretched. A Rope Keeper is included.
feature_bullets: Made using the highest quality materials
The 16-strand 75 foot long rope is UV-treated and Pre-Stretched.
